com.koverse.sdk.security

Interface Authorizer<U,G,D extends AuthorizerDescription<U,G>>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - The type of user.
    G - The type of group.
    D - The type of description.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ServerAuthorizer, WebAppAuthorizer

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
 @ThreadSafe
public interface Authorizer<U,G,D extends AuthorizerDescription<U,G>>
    Maps a user to groups and authorization tokens.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      D getDescription()
      Get the descriptor.
      Set<G> getGroups(U user)
      Get a user's groups.
      Set<String> getTokens(U user)
      Get the access control tokens for a user.

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        D getDescription()
        Get the descriptor.
        Returns:
        The descriptor.

      • getGroups

        Set<G> getGroups(U user)
        Get a user's groups. This method should NEVER return null. Return an empty set if no groups are found.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get groups for.
        Returns:
        The groups the user belongs, never null but may be empty.

      • getTokens

        Set<String> getTokens(U user)
        Get the access control tokens for a user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get access control tokens for.
        Returns:
        The access control tokens, never null but may be empty.
